relevant_findings.general: Pale appearance, small soft goiter, and slow deep tendon reflexes.
relevant_findings.weight: 40 kg, corresponding to a high-normal body mass index of 21 kg/m2.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Constipation frequency increased to every 2–3 days after LT4 stopped, compared to daily on LT4.

physical_examinations.date: 7 months after reinitiation of LT4 treatment

relevant_findings.development: Breast development progressed to Tanner stage III.
relevant_findings.neurological: No significant improvements in neurological assessment.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improved stool frequency normalized after reinitiation of LT4; however, cognitive and developmental assessment did not show improvement.

relevant_findings.general: Overweight with a body mass index of 36 kg/m2.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Heart rate increased from 75 bpm to 90 bpm after LT4 treatment; mild recall delay noted compared to functioning on LT4.
